00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00034 
00035 // privileges checking
00036 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00037 
00038 if (!$can_read) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 $max_print = 50;
00043 
00044 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00045 if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00046     if (!$can_read) {
00047         die();
00048     }
00049     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00050         // make an array
00051         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00052     }
00053     // loop array
00054     if (isset($_SESSION['barcodes'])) {
00055         $print_count = count($_SESSION['barcodes']);
00056     } else {
00057         $print_count = 0;
00058     }
00059     // barcode size
00060     $size = 2;
00061     // create AJAX request
00062     echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'prototype.js"></script>';
00063     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00064     // loop array
00065     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00066         if ($print_count == $max_print) {
00067             $limit_reach = true;
00068             break;
00069         }
00070         if (isset($_SESSION['barcodes'][$itemID])) {
00071             continue;
00072         }
00073         if (!empty($itemID)) {
00074             $barcode_text = trim($itemID);
00075             /* replace space */
00076             $barcode_text = str_replace(array(' ', '/', '\/'), '_', $barcode_text);
00077             /* replace invalid characters */
00078             $barcode_text = str_replace(array(':', ',', '*', '@'), '', $barcode_text);
00079             // send ajax request
00080             echo 'new Ajax.Request(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/phpbarcode/barcode.php?code='.$itemID.'&encoding='.$sysconf['barcode_encoding'].'&scale='.$size.'&mode=png\', { method: \'get\', onFailure: function(sendAlert) { alert(\'Error creating barcode!\'); } });'."\n";
00081             // add to sessions
00082             $_SESSION['barcodes'][$itemID] = $itemID;
00083             $print_count++;
00084         }
00085     }
00086     echo '</script>';
00087     sleep(2);
00088     if (isset($limit_reach)) {
00089         $msg = str_replace('{max_print}', $max_print, __('Selected items NOT ADDED to print queue. Only {max_print} can be printed at once')); //mfc
00090         utility::jsAlert($msg);
00091     } else {
00092         // update print queue count object
00093         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\''.$print_count.'\');</script>';
00094         utility::jsAlert(__('Selected items added to print queue'));
00095     }
00096     exit();
00097 }
00098 
00099 // clean print queue
00100 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'clear') {
00101     // update print queue count object
00102     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00103     utility::jsAlert(__('Print queue cleared!'));
00104     unset($_SESSION['barcodes']);
00105     exit();
00106 }
00107 
00108 // barcode pdf download
00109 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'print') {
00110     // check if label session array is available
00111     if (!isset($_SESSION['barcodes'])) {
00112         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00113         die();
00114     }
00115     if (count($_SESSION['barcodes']) < 1) {
00116         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00117         die();
00118     }
00119 
00120     // concat all ID together
00121     $item_ids = '';
00122     foreach ($_SESSION['barcodes'] as $id) {
00123         $item_ids .= '\''.$id.'\',';
00124     }
00125     // strip the last comma
00126     $item_ids = substr_replace($item_ids, '', -1);
00127     // send query to database
00128     $item_q = $dbs->query('SELECT b.title, i.item_code FROM item AS i
00129         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00130         WHERE i.item_code IN('.$item_ids.')');
00131     $item_data_array = array();
00132     while ($item_d = $item_q->fetch_row()) {
00133         if ($item_d[0]) {
00134             $item_data_array[] = $item_d;
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138     // include printed settings configuration file
00139     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'admin_template'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00140     // check for custom template settings
00141     $custom_settings = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['template']['theme'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00142     if (file_exists($custom_settings)) {
00143         include $custom_settings;
00144     }
00145     // chunk barcode array
00146     $chunked_barcode_arrays = array_chunk($item_data_array, $barcode_items_per_row);
00147     // create html ouput
00148     $html_str = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">'."\n";
00149     $html_str .= '<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head><title>Item Barcode Label Print Result</title>'."\n";
00150     $html_str .= '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />'."\n";
00151     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00152     $html_str .= 'body { padding: 0; margin: 1cm; font-family: '.$barcode_fonts.' }'."\n";
00153     $html_str .= '.labelStyle { width: '.$barcode_box_width.'cm; height: '.$barcode_box_height.'cm; text-align: center; margin: '.$barcode_items_margin.'cm; border: '.$barcode_border_size.'px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00154     $html_str .= '.labelHeaderStyle { background-color: #CCCCCC; font-weight: bold; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; }'."\n";
00155     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00156     $html_str .= '</head>'."\n";
00157     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00158     $html_str .= '<table style="margin: 0; padding: 0;" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">'."\n";
00159     // loop the chunked arrays to row
00160     foreach ($chunked_barcode_arrays as $barcode_rows) {
00161         $html_str .= '<tr>'."\n";
00162         foreach ($barcode_rows as $barcode) {
00163             $html_str .= '<td valign="top">';
00164             $html_str .= '<div class="labelStyle">';
00165             if ($barcode_include_header_text) { $html_str .= '<div class="labelHeaderStyle">'.($barcode_header_text?$barcode_header_text:$sysconf['library_name']).'</div>'; }
00166             // document title
00167             $html_str .= '<div style="font-size: 7pt;">';
00168             if ($barcode_cut_title) {
00169                 $html_str .= substr($barcode[0], 0, $barcode_cut_title).'...';
00170             } else { $html_str .= $barcode[0]; }
00171             $html_str .= '</div>';
00172             $html_str .= '<img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/barcodes/'.str_replace(array(' '), '_', $barcode[1]).'.png" style="width: '.$barcode_scale.'%;" border="0" />';
00173             $html_str .= '</div>';
00174             $html_str .= '</td>';
00175         }
00176         $html_str .= '<tr>'."\n";
00177     }
00178     $html_str .= '</table>'."\n";
00179     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00180     $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00181     // unset the session
00182     unset($_SESSION['barcodes']);
00183     // write to file
00184     $file_write = @file_put_contents(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.'item_barcode_gen_print_result.html', $html_str);
00185     if ($file_write) {
00186         // update print queue count object
00187         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00188         // open result in window
00189         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.FILES_DIR.'/item_barcode_gen_print_result.html\', \'popItemBarcodeGen\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00190     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Item barcodes failed to generate, possibly because '.SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.FILES_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00191     exit();
00192 }
00193 
00194 ?>

00196 <div class="menuBoxInner printIcon">
00197     <?php echo __('Item Barcodes Printing'); ?> - <a target="blindSubmit" href="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/item_barcode_generator.php?action=print" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Print Barcodes for Selected Data');?></a>
00198     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/item_barcode_generator.php?action=clear" class="headerText2" style="color: #FF0000;"><?php echo __('Clear Print Queue'); ?></a>
00199     <hr />
00200     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00201     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00202     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/item_barcode_generator.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00203     </form>
00204     <div style="margin-top: 3px;">
00205     <?php
00206     echo __('Maximum').' <font style="color: #FF0000">'.$max_print.'</font> '.__('records can be printed at once. Currently there is').' '; //mfc
00207     if (isset($_SESSION['barcodes'])) {
00208         echo '<font id="queueCount" style="color: #FF0000">'.count($_SESSION['barcodes']).'</font>';
00209     } else { echo '<font id="queueCount" style="color: #FF0000">0</font>'; }
00210     echo ' '.__('in queue waiting to be printed.'); //mfc
00211     ?>

00215 <?php
00216 /* search form end */
00217 /* ITEM LIST */
00218 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_UTILS/simbio_tokenizecql.inc.php';
00219 require LIB_DIR.'biblio_list.inc.php';
00220 // table spec
00221 $table_spec = 'item LEFT JOIN biblio ON item.biblio_id=biblio.biblio_id';
00222 // create datagrid
00223 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00224 $datagrid->setSQLColumn('item.item_code',
00225     'item.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00226     'biblio.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'');
00227 $datagrid->setSQLorder('item.last_update DESC');
00228 // is there any search
00229 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00230     $keywords = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00231     $searchable_fields = array('title', 'author', 'subject', 'itemcode');
00232     $search_str = '';
00233     // if no qualifier in fields
00234     if (!preg_match('@[a-z]+\s*=\s*@i', $keywords)) {
00235         foreach ($searchable_fields as $search_field) {
00236             $search_str .= $search_field.'='.$keywords.' OR ';
00237         }
00238     } else {
00239         $search_str = $keywords;
00240     }
00241     $biblio_list = new biblio_list($dbs);
00242     $criteria = $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($search_str);
00243 }
00244 if (isset($criteria)) {
00245     $datagrid->setSQLcriteria('('.$criteria['sql_criteria'].')');
00246 }
00247 // set table and table header attributes
00248 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00249 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00250 // edit and checkbox property
00251 $datagrid->edit_property = false;
00252 $datagrid->chbox_property = array('itemID', __('Add'));
00253 $datagrid->chbox_action_button = __('Add To Print Queue');
00254 $datagrid->chbox_confirm_msg = __('Add to print queue?');
00255 $datagrid->column_width = array('10%', '85%');
00256 // set checkbox action URL
00257 $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00258 // put the result into variables
00259 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, $can_read);
00260 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00261     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00262     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"<div>'.__('Query took').' <b>'.$datagrid->query_time.'</b> '.__('second(s) to complete').'</div></div>'; //mfc
00263 }
00264 echo $datagrid_result;
00265 /* main content end */
00266 ?>
